dataIdInfo.idAbs:
The "Update S3 Bucket" tool syncs local data to the StreamStats AWS S3 Bucket.

This tool can be used to upload data for a single region by selecting the proper files for that region.

tool.name: updateS3Bucket

param.name: log_Note
param.displayname: Describe changes made in this update (limit 50 chars)
param.dialogReference: Describe the purpose of this upload, and any changes made to the data.

param.name: workspace
param.dialogReference: The temporary workspace where the regional data will be moved before parsing and uploaded.

param.name: state_folder
param.dialogReference:
Select the state/region folder that contains the "archydro" and "bc_layers" folders for the region. Required if copying bc_layers, archydro or any folders within archydro to S3.

This folder should consist only of an abbreviation of one of the 50 United States (ex. NY, TX), the District of Columbia (DC), the Connecticut River Basin (CRB), the Delaware River Basin (DRB) or the Rainy River Basin (RRB).

param.name: xml_files
param.dialogReference:
Select the region's".xml" file, whose name should contain "StreamStats" plus the region abbreviation. Required if copying bc_layers, archydro or any folders within archydro to S3.

Ex. "StreamStatsTX.xml"

param.name: copy_data_bc_layers
param.dialogReference: When checked, the region's "bc_layers" folder will be copied to S3.

param.name: copy_data_archydro
param.dialogReference:
When checked, the region's entire "archydro" folder will be copied to S3.

If 'Copy Global.gdb' is selected or any huc folders are given, this will be unchecked.

param.name: copy_global
param.dialogReference:
When checked, the region's "global.gdb" file within "archydro" will be copied to S3.

This will uncheck 'Copy entire archydro folder'

param.name: huc_folders
param.dialogReference:
Input the individual huc folders you want to be copied to S3.

You can insert the huc ID, (i.e. "07080105") or you can select the file location of the huc folder.

Adding huc folders will uncheck 'Copy entire archydro folder'

param.name: schema_files
param.dialogReference:
Select the input schema .gdb file. Generally named using the state abbreviation plus "_ss.gdb".

Ex. "NY_ss.gdb"

tool.summary:
The "Update S3 Bucket" tool syncs local data to the StreamStats AWS S3 Bucket.

This tool can be used to upload data for a single region by selecting the proper files for that region.
